## OM Diagnostic Reports
<div class="col4">

```{r, include=FALSE}
fls <- list.files('Reports/Diagnostics', pattern='.html')

num <- NA
for (x in seq_along(fls)) num[x] <- strsplit(fls[x], '-')[[1]][2]
nums <- as.numeric(num[1:(length(num)-1)])
nums <- c(nums+1, 1)
df <- data.frame(fl=fls, num=nums, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df <- df %>% dplyr::arrange(num)

```

```{r, results='asis'}
for (i in 1:nrow(df)) {
  nm <- strsplit(df[i,1], '.html')[[1]][1]
  fl <- paste0('Reports/Diagnostics/', df[i,1])
  cat('\n[',nm,'](',fl,')\n', sep="")
}
```
</div>
